content: it s so hard to tie a perfect bow something always ends up uneven or facing the wrong direction winter s bow is fool-proof yes it is three pieces when you can usually tie a bow with a single ribbon but it s worth the assembly to end up with the most picture-perfect woven-look wool bow you ve ever seen the linen stitch adds a bit of complexity to the instructions but also makes it an interesting knit and a gorgeous texture sew it to a barrette clip or simply bobby pin it into hair for an accessory that s worthy of any winter s ball
